## Overview

Wrapper component for the whole page

## Slots

| Slot             | Description          |
| ---------------- | -------------------- |
| `"Default slot"` | Contents of the page |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                        | Description      |
| --------------------------- | ---------------- |
| `--c-main-background-color` | Background color |
| `--c-main-text-color`       | Text color       |
